{"blocks":[{"key":"dgmas","text":" 
Spin down purified LRRK2-RCKW (10000 rcf, 4°C, 10 minutes). Leave protein on ice afterward.
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bc2mg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"501dq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1keif","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"egcfb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eha9m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"apdo9","text":"For the best result, keep protein on ice and reduce the amount of time between spinning
and freezing cryo-EM samples.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2m94r","text":"




","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fkbkb","text":"Exchange buffer using a spin desalting column (Zeba™ Spin Desalting Columns, 7K MWCO (Catalog number: 89877).  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1aotp","text":"Thaw the DARPin protein of your interest (E11 or C12) and spin it down. Measure its concentration.


","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"33cd9","text":"Based on LRRK2-RCKW concentration, add the necessary volume to get a proportional ratio\nLRRK2:DARPin 1:1.25 and dilute to a final 10 micromolar (µM) LRRK2-RCKW concentration using exchange buffer (150 mM NaCl)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ae2s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d18e4","text":"Incubate 10 minutes at RT. Afterward, keep it on ice until grid preparation.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: LRRK2:DARPins complex preparation
